3.title: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein
3.description: Based on Manju Kapoor's Custody, this is the story of Raman and Ishita, brought together by destiny and their love for Ruhi, Raman's daughter from his ex-wife.

12.title: Mahadev
12.description: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to Parvati.

423.title: Iss Pyar Ko Kya Naam
423.description: A perfect story of opposites attract, where Khushi, a simple girl and Arnav, an arrogant businessman realise that they cannot live without each other.

435.title: Mahabharat
435.description: The mother of all wars, the epitome of all rivalries, the cauldron of emotions, insecurities, jealousies, and power play - Mahabharat!

586.title: Yeh Rishta
586.description: Kartik, Naira and Sirat's daughters are all grown up. Akshara immensely loves Aarohi. But, what happens when they are caught in a love triangle with Abhimanyu?

6363.title: Siya Ke Ram
6363.description: A classic epic Ramayana, the story of Ram and Sita, retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Sita.

9567.title: Ishqbaaz
9567.description: Brothers Shivaay, Omkara and Rudra share an unbreakable bond despite their dysfunctional family. What happens when cupid strikes each of them?

14455.title: Bigg Boss
14455.description: Get ready for a fresh dose of entertainment as Kamal Haasan returns with a brand new season of unfiltered drama and mind-boggling twists.

1260000646.title: RadhaKrishn
1260000646.description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.

1260003582.title: Divya-Drishti
1260003582.description: Separated at childhood, Divya and Drishti attain super powers to see and manipulate future. But their own future lies in the hands of a Pisachini.

1260022017.title: Anupama
1260022017.description: Despite the many challenges thrown her way, Anupama begins a new chapter of her life post-divorce. Head held always high, what's waiting for her next?

1260043179.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey
1260043179.description: Retreating from tragedy, Virat ties the knot with Pakhi to initiate new beginnings. Years later, when Sai returns, he is forced to question his choices.

1260048110.title: Imlie
1260048110.description: The saga continues! Imlie and Chini grow up as strong and independent women but differ in personalities. Will their sisterly bond prevail amid the ego clash?

1260052109.title: The Legend of Hanuman
1260052109.description: Hanuman has realised his limitless powers, and now he must journey alone to Lanka to face the might of the demon king Ravan, his fierce sons and his armies.

1260081919.title: Anurager Chhowa
1260081919.description: TODAY'S EP IS DELAYED. A story of love conquering prejudices, Surjyo and Deepa discover each other’s real beauty and form an eternal bond despite forces trying to keep them apart.

1260103747.title: Aashiqana
1260103747.description: When a medical trial spurs a deadly menace, Yash and Chikki must race against time to unravel a gruesome conspiracy whilst dealing with a foe from the past.

1260105438.title: Shoorveer
1260105438.description: When an imminent attack threatens India, an elite unit - the Hawks - undertake a mission that will test the limits of their courage and grit.

1260108952.title: Criminal Justice: Adhura Sach
1260108952.description: When a teenage star's brother becomes the prime suspect in her murder, Madhav Mishra takes the case, only to realise he has to first tackle his client's lies.

1260113215.title: Aar Ya Paar
1260113215.description: When the modern world's greed destroys his idyllic tribal existence, a valiant archer becomes a deadly assassin to get even.

1260126094.title: Taaza Khabar
1260126094.description: A public toilet caretaker's poverty-stricken life takes a drastic U-turn when he helps an old woman. How long will fate smile upon him?
